Course Schedule
 

      CS 415      
      Operating Systems      
      Course Logistics (Fall 2025)      

The LECTURE will be on Tuesday/Thursday, 16:00-17:20, 125 McKenzie Hall (MCK). The lecture slides will be posted before the class meeting, and the lectures will be live on ZoomLinks to an external site.. Lecture recordings will also be posted.

The LAB will be on Thursday, B026 Klamath.

The following abbreviations are used in the table below:

OSC - Operating Systems Concepts text book
TCPL - The C Programming Language book (A "to not be printed" copy is here Download here.)
PIC - Programming in C
LMP - Linux Man Pages
DOC - Additional Documents
All lecture slides, assignments, lab, and project materials will be available on Canvas.

Week	Date	Topic	Readings	Assignments

Tutorial: Heaps and ADTs in C

Tools: Oracle VirtualBox Links to an external site., UTMLinks to an external site., Git Links to an external site., Subversion Links to an external site., Valgrind Links to an external site., GDBLinks to an external site.

OSC: Chapter 6

Papers:

E.W. Dijkstra, " Solution of a Problem in Concurrent Programming Control," CACM, Vol. 8, Issue 9, September 1965.

E.W. Dijkstra, " Cooperating Sequential Processes," The Origin of Concurrent Programming, pp. 65-138, Springer-Verlag, 2002.

L. Lamport, " A New Solution of Dijkstra's Concurrent Programming Problem," CACM, Vol. 17, No. 8, August 1974.
